snippet: In a documentary, six people explain in great detail how they had shot or carved up scores of people. But the film is not expected to gain much attention.
lead_paragraph: In a documentary, six people explain in great detail how they had shot or carved up scores of people. But the film is not expected to gain much attention.

headline.print_headline: When Killers Talk, Few in India Seem to Care
headline.main: When Killers Talk, Few in India Seem to Care
